name: The Sun Is A Deadly Laser
name_original: The Sun Is A Deadly Laser
description:
===========================

Game For [Trijam 164]

Theme: Day/Night Cycle

===========================

Run away from the Sun to avoid burning, use the Moon's shadow as a shield!

The Sun of this planet is far to hot for any living creature to survive, stranded on the desolate body, survive for as long as you can by outrunning the Sun. Use the Moon to move backwards behind the Sun and live another day!

Every full solar orbit is worth 1 Point

===========================

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrow Key(s) To Move

W or Up Arrow Key To Move

Enter To Confirm

===========================

Music Credits:

Run Against The Universe by Komiku: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-...

Fracture Of The Universe Will Happen Soon by Komiku: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-...
